title: Fat sans-serif rounded corners font.
content:
Hello!

Might be a custom-made font, but I'm still asking.

What The Font can't identify it.

Thanks!

Chris.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130320055914im_/http:/typophile.com/files/test_4702.jpg)
author: krissserz

comments.content: Seems to me like a cross between Block Berthold Condensed and Hermes Black...
Seems like a tough one, hein?
Where did you get this sample? I'm just wondering if there is more to see. (Which can help.)

I found a reference to the image at the studio [FEED](http://web.archive.org/web/20130320055914/http:/www.studiofeed.ca/realisations/logotypes/). (Third logo in)

Edit: I Really need to double check with a refresh before posting.

Hmm. Did you email the studio to ask? The G is off-balance and the counter of the A is odd too. This makes me think they did start with a regular font and add the irregularities for originality. Perhaps they will answer.

OK! I contacted them.

I was right!

Thanks to all,

Chris.
